Class ConcurrencyController

java.lang.Object
SystemEnvironment.ConcurrencyController
public class ConcurrencyController extends Object
Manages concurrency control operations for a processor.

This class serves as a framework that delegates to an underlying ConcurrencyControlProtocol implementation to handle resource synchronization during scheduling.

Author:
ShiuJia

  • Method Details

    • preAction

      public void preAction()
      此處為同步方法在排程啟動前，所要進行的工作 目前沒有特別寫什麼，但有設定parent指標 未來可以考慮加上 protocol.preAction()的呼叫

    • checkJobArrives

      public void checkJobArrives(Job j)
      此處為在進行排程時，定義當job到達系統時，protocol所要進行的工作 若一個同步控制方法在job到達系統時，有必須完成的工作，就可以寫在 protocol的jobArrivesAction()方法裡
      Parameters:
      j - the job that arrives

    • jobPreemptedAction

      public void jobPreemptedAction(Job preemptedJob, Job nextJob)
      待釐清 此處為在進行排程時，定義某個job「被搶先」或「搶先其它job」時，protocol所要進行的工作 what is nextJob?
      Parameters:
      preemptedJob - the job being preempted
      nextJob - the job doing the preemption

    • checkFirstExecuteAction

      public boolean checkFirstExecuteAction(Job j)
      待釐清 此處為在進行排程時，第一次執行「job」前，protocol所要進行的工作
      Parameters:
      j - the job to check
      Returns:
      true if the job can execute

    • checkJobLock

      public boolean checkJobLock(Job j)
      Checks if a job can lock a resource.
      Parameters:
      j - the job
      Returns:
      true if the job can continue, false if blocked

    • JobFirstExecuteAction

      public void JobFirstExecuteAction(Job j)
      Executes the first-time execute action for a job.
      Parameters:
      j - the job

    • checkJobUnlock

      Parameters:
      j - the job

      Parameters:
      j - the job

    • checkBlockedAction

      public boolean checkBlockedAction(Job blockedJob, SharedResource blockingRes)
      Handles job blocking.
      Parameters:
      blockedJob - the job that is blocked
      blockingRes - the resource causing the block
      Returns:
      true if blocked successfully

    • setConcurrencyControlProtocol

      public void setConcurrencyControlProtocol(ConcurrencyControlProtocol p)
      Sets the concurrency control protocol.
      Parameters:
      p - the concurrency control protocol
